mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.rec_ver AS "recVer", a.type AS "type", a.description AS "description", a.url AS "url", a.params AS "params", a.org_id AS "orgId"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cd_tracking_info( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, rec_ver, type, description, url, params, org_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{recVer}, #{type}, #{description}, #{url}, #{params}, #{orgId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cd_tracking_info SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, rec_ver = #{recVer} + 1, type = #{type}, description = #{description}, url = #{url}, params = #{params}, org_id = #{orgId} WHERE id = #{id} AND rec_ver = #{recVer}
